Html:
Breadcrum: SQL 2008 SSMS, while logged in to a server, click on internals vierwer menu, pop up with login, filled in credentials (in second tab selected the database i wanted), hit ok, got error, internals viewert tab does load. with database combo box grayed out.

In the registry Loadbehaviour changes from 1 to 3

Details below,

Nexus64 / Theo

See the end of this message for details on invoking
just-in-time (JIT) debugging instead of this dialog box.

************** JIT Debugging **************
To enable just-in-time (JIT) debugging, the .config file for this
application or computer (machine.config) must have the
jitDebugging value set in the system.windows.forms section.
The application must also be compiled with debugging
enabled.

For example:

<configuration>

</configuration>

When JIT debugging is enabled, any unhandled exception
will be sent to the JIT debugger registered on the computer

Breadcrum: in the internals tabl, click on "connect to database", filled in redentials (sql server auth, options: default), cick connect, get error:

Probably you forgot to check for SQL 2000, connection to a SQL 2005 works fine.

System.Data.SqlClient.SqlException: Invalid object name 'sys.database_files'.
   at System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.OnError(SqlException exception, Boolean breakConnection)
   at System.Data.SqlClient.SqlInternalConnection.OnError(SqlException exception, Boolean breakConnection)
   at System.Data.SqlClient.TdsParser.ThrowExceptionAndWarning(TdsParserStateObject stateObj)
   at System.Data.SqlClient.TdsParser.Run(RunBehavior runBehavior, SqlCommand cmdHandler, SqlDataReader dataStream, BulkCopySimpleResultSet bulkCopyHandler, TdsParserStateObject stateObj)
   at System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataReader.ConsumeMetaData()
